All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
AddUser
A class to add a new user to the database
Boot
A class to boot into Mosaic.
CreateDB
A class to initialize the database file
DebugLauncher
NOT FOR PUBLIC RELEASE.
DETAILS UNAVAILABLE.
Download
A class to implement the FileManager functionality
ErrorHandler
A class to handle all types of errors thrown by the program.
FileManager
A class to implement the FileManager functionality
Information
A class to display the program information across modules.
Launcher
Class that will help in launching the program correctly.
LoginAPI
A class to return status value of a queried username, password and security key for login programs
LogService
A class to log the events into a log file.
MainMenu
A class which handles modules and user inputs after login.
policyEnforce
A class to check if a policy for a module is enabled or not.
ReadFile
A class to read a help file or a user's file.
RestartProgram
A class to restart the program (HAS KNOWN ISSUES)
SettingsInterface
A class serving as a front end to administrate policies and configure it.
Setup
A class which helps to setup the program environment.
SHA256
A class to encode a string using the SHA3-256 algorithm
textEdit
A class to read a help file or a user's file.
UpdateCredentials
A class for changing the current user's credentials
UpdateInterface
A class which is a front end to update the program.
